parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Skrytý
parameter.descr: Pokud je ZAPNUTO, znaky budou zobrazovány všechny stejně pomocí jednoho „neviditelného“ znaku, což se hodí pro zadávání hesel

parameter.name: Skjult
parameter.descr: Hvis angivet som TRUE bliver alle tegn vist med brug af et enkelt "usynligt" tegn, egnet til at indtaste adgangskoder

parameter.name: Verborgen
parameter.descr: Falls »wahr«, werden alle Zeichen als einzelnes »unsichtbares« Zeichen dargestellt, zur Eingabe von Passwörtern

parameter.name: Hidden
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Κρυφό
parameter.descr: Εάν οριστεί σε TRUE, εμφανίζονται όλοι οι χαρακτήρες χρησιμοποιώντας ένα μοναδικό 'αόρατο' χαρακτήρα, κατάλληλο για εισαγωγή κωδικών πρόσβασης

parameter.name: Hidden
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Hidden
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Kaŝite
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Oculto
parameter.descr: Si está establecido todos los caracteres se muestran usando un único carácter «invisible», apropiado para introducir contraseñas

parameter.name: Ezkutukoa
parameter.descr: TRUE (egia) gisa ezartzen bada, karaktere guztiak bistaratuko dira karaktere 'ikuskaitz' bat erabiliz, pasahitzak sartzeko oso erabilgarria

parameter.name: Hidden
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Piilotettu
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Masqué
parameter.descr: Si défini comme VRAI, les caractères sont affichés à l'aide d'un seul caractère « invisible », adapté à la saisie de mots de passe

parameter.name: Hidden
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Oculto
parameter.descr: Se se estabelece a TRUE todos os caracteres móstranse usando un carácter único «invisíbel», que é quen de de introducir contrasinais.

parameter.name: Hidden
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Hidden
parameter.descr: If set to TRUE, characters are all displayed using a single 'invisible' character, suitable to enter passwords

parameter.name: Tersembunyi
parameter.descr: Bila berisi TRUE, semua karakter ditampilkan memakai karaktar 'tak nampak' tunggal, cocok untuk memasukkan sandi

parameter.name: Nascosto
parameter.descr: Se impostato a VERO, i caratteri vengono tutti mostrati usando un singolo carattere "invisibile", adatto all'immissione password
